snippet: The Taliban said the recording was from Mullah Akhtar Muhammad Mansour, who in recent days was rumored to be killed or wounded in a shooting in Pakistan.
abstract: Taliban release recording they claim is of their leader Mullah Akhtar Muhammad Mansour, aimed at countering reports he was killed by rival faction in shootout in Pakistan.

byline.contributor: Ihsanullah Tipu Mehsud contributed reporting from Islamabad, Pakistan, and Taimoor Shah from Kandahar, Afghanistan.

lead_paragraph: The Taliban said the recording was from Mullah Akhtar Muhammad Mansour, who in recent days was rumored to be killed or wounded in a shooting in Pakistan.

headline.main: Taliban Release Audio Purported to Be of Their Leader
headline.print_headline: Audio Purported to Be of Taliban Head
